name: Open iT Inc.
tag_list: software-usage-tracking, software-usage-metering, software-it-management, monitor-software-usage, software-monitoring, software-optimization, license-management, software-asset-management
overview:
Open iT creates software for IT resource monitoring, reporting and optimization.

Companies around the globe use Open iT to reduce the cost and complexity of managing corporate IT assets with capabilities including:

  • Software License Management on Windows, Unix and Linux
  • Metering of License Managers, Application Servers and User Licenses
  • Corporate Wide Software Inventory
  • IT Asset Optimization and Asset Usage Metering
  • Supports Server and Storage Virtualization and Consolidation.
